author: Laurent Giret
title: Microsoft Photos Adds New AI Features for Insiders on Copilot+ PCs
description:
Windows Insiders on Copilot+ PCs can test new AI-powered Relight and Search experiences in the Microsoft Photos app.
The post Microsoft Photos Adds New AI Features for Insiders on Copilot+ PCs appeared first on Thurrott.com.
content:
Windows Insiders on Copilot+ PCs can test two new AI-powered features in the Microsoft Photos app today. The first one is called Relight, and it adds dynamic lighting controls to pictures.
